body: Then you can't have been around the block very many times, Doffy. For better or worse...
This is probably the worst translation I've ever seen.
Oh, and also, this is far from the worst I've ever seen. His message is at least intelligible, y'know?

I'd say so, myself. At the very least, it shows a degree of sincerity, although one could contend that presenting a product you know to be substandard is a poor decision, if not a callous one. That said, the best way to improve one's literacy (in any language) is to seek an outside perspective on the matter; better still, to receive feedback from someone already fluent in the language(s) in question. ...That's just my take, of course, but still.
AT least the guy's honest... If that's any consolation
